TopicTitle: Custom solar Panel GUI stuck Showing Extending

Articles.Content:
Hello I'm working on a part pack for KSP. Inside unity i have set the animation wrap mode too default and I'm using legacy skeleton. Animation inside KSP work just fine, i can extend and retract but the GUI shows up saying "Extending..." when i click extend the animation completes but GUI still says EXTENDING. When i click extract that works just fine GUI says Extracting. any help would be awesome. here is the MODULE used in my config.

MODULE

{

name = ModuleDeployableSolarPanel

sunTracking = true

animationName = SolarPanel|Cylinder.001Action.001

raycastTransformName = suncatcher

pivotName = SolarPanel

isBreakable = false

resourceName = ElectricCharge

chargeRate = 1.9

powerCurve

{

key = 206000000000 0 0 0

key = 13599840256 1 0 0

key = 68773560320 0.5 0 0

key = 0 10 0 0

}

}
Usually this happens when your animation is referenced incorrectly. Your anim there has a really odd name - recommend you change it to something without the '|' character
Thanks Nertea. I changed the name and found out that i needed to create a empty game called Pivot. and made the panels a child. and it worked.
